column5: Just a heads up. Not sure if it pertains to all Costco's.  Fitment code 16: DeepCycle 750CA/115Ah: 98$-20$off = 78$ Fitment code 15: DeepCycle 685CA/95Ah: 80$-16$off = 64$ Fitment code 14: Starting/DeepCycle 845CA/120Ah: 109$-22$off = 87$

just an FYI on Kirkland batteries from Costco. my battery went kaput's on me in my Mazda mx3. i needed a battery and had to walk to Costco to get one. it was the closest place within walking distance. i pushed it home in a shopping cart. put it in the car, and the car fired right up. and it continued to fire up without a single problem for the next 4 years.  so i highly recommend there batteries for any application.  Dann
Did you bring that shopping cart back..
Wish we had a Costco here, I need a new battery for my boat winch.
Do ya mean right in Snug Harbour, Cliff?  There is one in Peterborough ya know...

Cliff,  Do you want me to pick one up for you? If so, let me know which one you want and I'll grab one for you. I don't know if the store near me here in Richmond Hill has the same sale but I'll check tomorrow for ya.  I'll be up to open the trailer early may and can drop it off then if that's okay?  Peter
Thanks Peter but I need one for this weekend, I may just have to make a sales call in Peterborough LOL.
